title: 27th Annual International Dance Music Awards Nominees and Winners
text:
27th Annual International Dance Music Awards Nominees and Winners
The 27th Annual International Dance Music Awards will be presented on Thursday March 22, 2012 at The Beachplex. Voting for nominees is open until March 1st. You can vote by going to the IDMA Website.
1. Best Underground Dance Track
Battle For Middle You - Julio Bashmore - PMR
"Bear Hug" - The Two Bears - Southern Fried Records
"Big Bad Wolf" - Duck Sauce - Big Beat Records
"Can't Leave You" - Maceo Plex - Crosstown Rebels
"Doin' Your Thang" - Oliver $ - Play It down
"Entrance Song" - Eats Everything - Pets Recordings
"Starblazer" - Deetron - Rejected
2. Best Alternative/Rock Dance Track
"Called Out In The Dark" - Snow Patrol - Island Records
"Eyes Be Closed" - Washed Out - Sub Pop
"Hurting (Benoit & Sergio Remix)" - Friendly Fires - XL Recordings
"Midnight City" - M83 - Mute
"Paradise (Fedde Le Grand Remix)" - Coldplay - Capitol/EMI/Toolroom
"Polish Girl" - Neon Indian - Mom + Pop Music
"Pumped Up Kicks" - Foster The People - Columbia
3. Best Indie Dance Track
"Black Water" - Apparat - Mute
"Hungry For The Power (Jamie Jones Remix)" - Azari & III - Turbo Recordings
"Need Your Lovin'" - Tensnake - Permanent Vacation
"Ragysh" - Todd Terje - Running Back
"Trouble" - Totally Enormous Extinct Dinosaurs - Nice Age
"Wait & See" - Holy Ghost! - DFA
"Walk And Talk" - Benoit & Sergio - Visionquest
4. Best Latin/Reggaeton Track
"Frio" - Ricky Martin Feat. Wisin y Yandel - Sony Music Latin
"Loca People" - Sak Noel - Ultra Records
"Me Gusto Tanto" - Paulina Rubio - Universal
"On The Floor" - Jennifer Lopez Feat. Pitbull - Island Records
"Rabiosa" - Shakira Feat. Pitbull - Sony Music Latin/Epic
"Rain On Me" - Pitbull Feat. Mark Anthony - Mr.305/Polo Grounds Music/J Records
"Tu Olor" - Wisin y Yandel - Machete Music
5. Best Commercial/Pop Dance Track
"Give Me Everything" - Pitbull Feat. Ne-Yo, Afrojack & Nayer - Mr.305/Polo Grounds Music/J Records
"Born This Way" - Lady Gaga - Streamline/Kon Live/Interscope
"Moves Like Jagger" - Maroon 5 Feat Christina Aguilera - A&M;/Octone Records
"On The Floor" - Jennifer Lopez Feat. Pitbull - Island Records
"Party Rock Anthem" - LMFAO - Party Rock/Will I Am/Cherrytree/Interscope
"We Found Love" - Rihanna Feat. Calvin Harris - Island Def Jam Music Group
"Without You" - David Guetta Feat. Usher - Astralwerks/Capitol
6. Best House/Garage/Deep House Track
"Amame" - Intruder, Murk - Defected
"Around (Solomun Remix)" - Noir & Haze - Noir Music
"Doin' Your Thang" - Oliver $ - Play It Down
"Envision (Ame Remix)" - Osunlade - Innervisions
"La Musica (The Trumpeter)" - Ray Foxx Feat. Lovelle - Defected
"Stay High" - Maceo Plex - Ellum Audio
"What They Say" - Maya Jane Coles - Real Tone Records
7. Best R & B/Urban Dance Track
"Beautiful People" - Chris Brown Feat. Benny Benassi - Jive
"Coming Home (Dirty South Remix)" - Diddy-Dirty Money Feat. Skylar Grey - Bad Boy/Interscope
"Good Feeling" - Flo Rida - Poe Boy/Atlantic
"Run The World (Girls)" - Beyonce - Parkwood Entertainment/Columbia
"Super Bass" - Nicki Minaj - YMCM/Universal Republic
"We Found Love" - Rihanna Feat. Calvin Harris - Island Def Jam Music Group
"Without You" - David Guetta Feat. Usher - Astralwerks/Capitol
8. Best Electro/Tech House Track
"Cinema" - Benny Benassi Feat. Gary Go - Ultra Records
"Happy Violence" - Dada Life - So Much Dada
"Levels" - Avicii - Interscope
"No Beef" - Afrojack & Steve Aoki Feat. Miss Palmer - Ultra Records
"Save The World" - Swedish House Mafia - Astralwerks
"The Tide (Jooris Vorn Edit)" - Mark Fanciulli - Rejected
"Turbulence" - Laidback Luke & Steve Aoki Feat. Lil Jon - Ultra Records
9. Best Rap/Hip Hop Dance Track
"All The Lights" - Kayne West - Roc-A-Fella
"Coming Home (Dirty South Remix)" - Diddy-Dirty Money Feat. Skylar Grey - Bad Boy/Interscope
"Good Feeling" - Flo Rida - Poe Boy/Atlantic
"I Need A Doctor" - Dr. Dre Feat. Eminem & Skylar Grey - Aftermath
"Look At Me Now" - Chris Brown Feat. Lil Wayne & Busta Rhymes - Jive
"Super Bass "- Nicki Minaj - YMCM/Universal Republic
"Where Them Girls At" - David Guetta Feat. Nicki Minaj & Flo Rida - Astralwerks/Capitol
10. Best Trance Track
"Be Your Sound" - Cosmic Gate & Emma Hewitt - Black Hole Recordings
"Better Half Of Me" - Dash Berlin Feat. Jonathan Mendelsohn - Armada Music
"Feels So Good" - Armin van Buuren Feat. Nadia Ali - Ultra Records/Armada Music
"Maximal Crazy" - Tiësto - Musical Freedom
"Promises" - Andain - Black Hole Recordings
"Skyfire" - Shogun - Armada Music
"Sun & Moon" - Above & Beyond Feat. Richard Bedford - Ultra Records/Anjuna Beats
11. Best Progressive Track
"Calling" - Sebastian Ingrosso & Alesso - Refune Records
"In the Air" - Morgan Page, Sultan + Ned Shephard & BT Feat. Angela McCluskey - Nettwerk
"Paradise (Fedde Le Grand Remix)" - Coldplay - Capitol/EMI/Toolroom

"Save The World" - Swedish House Mafia - Astralwerks
"Sun Down" - Chris Lake - Ultra Records
"You've Got the Love (Mark Knight Remix)" - Florence + The Machine - Universal Republic/Toolroom
12. Best Dubstep/DnB/Jungle Track
"Bass Cannon" - Flux Pavillion - Circus
"Cinema (Skrillex Remix)" - Benny Bennassi - Ultra Records
"Crush On You" - Nero - Cherrytree/Interscope
"First Of The Year" - Skrillex - Big Beat/Atlantic
"Lights (Bassnectar Remix)" - Ellie Goulding - Cherrytree/Interscope
"Louder" - DJ Fresh - Ministry Of Sound
"Promises (Skrillex & Nero Remix)" - Nero - Cherrytree/Interscope
13. Best Minimal/Techno Track
"6 Degrees - Audiofly - Get Physical
"Arabian Horse" - Gusgus - Kompakt
"Carny" - Pleasurekraft - Great Stuff Recordings
"Chemistry (Nicole Moudaber Remix)" - Carl Cox - Intec
"Cicadas" - Tom Middleton - Lo:Rise
"Love Song" - Pig & Dan - Yoshitoshi/Paraquet Recordings
"The Tide (Joris Voorn Edit)" - Mark Fanciulli - Rejected
14. Best Chillout/Lounge Track
"Hayling (Max Cooper Remix)" - FC Kahuna - Skint
"Heart Of Wax" - Vanessa Daou - KID Recordings
"How Long (Kaskade's Ice Mix)" - Kaskade & Inpetto with Late Night Alumni - Ultra Records
"Paradise Circus" - Burial VS Massive Attack - Inhale Gold
"Promises" - Andain - Black Hole Recordings
"Shake It Out (Weekend Remix)" - Florence + The Machine - Universal
"Shores Of Eden (Chillout Mix)" - Tenishia - Armada Music
